column4: hi, i just installed Ubuntu on my windows vista system, but im having trouble connecting to the wireless because my Dell Inspiron Wireless card can't be turned on. Any help?
its a Broadcom wireless card, the default to come with a Dell Inspiron 1501
it may take some doing, there is a wiki for it on the Ubuntu docs page
mine worked default with 8.10 on an Inspiron 2200
